message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you a small share, but I think I deserve more for taking the risk of negotiating!
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a better deal to account for the inflation!
I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share, but I still think I deserve more!
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a better deal to account for the inflation and my patience!
I'm starting to get impatient, but I'm still willing to give you a decent share!
I'm not getting any younger, Bob! It's time to make a serious offer!
I'm getting close to walking away, but I'll give you one last chance to make a deal!
This is my final offer. Take it or leave it!
